basic_data.Description:
THIS AWARD FUNDS THE APPROVED 2023-24 AMERICORPS FORMULA PROGRAMS, AS LISTED ON THE APPROVED PROGRAM AND FUNDING SUMMARY CHARTS. NO MEMBER MAY ENROLL PRIOR TO THE APPROVED START DATE OF THE MEMBER ENROLLMENT PERIOD. YOUR 2023-24 BUDGETARY MATCH IS 51.4%.

CIVICWELL: FUND NEW ACTIVITIES. TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICE BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 100.
PORTERVILLE UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT: FUND NEW ACTIVITIES. TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICE BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 85.
UNITED WAY MONTEREY COUNTY: FUND NEW ACTIVITIES: TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICES BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 24.
REDWOOD PARKS CONSERVANCY: FUND NEW ACTIVITIES: TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICES BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 20.
SEWA INTERNATIONAL INC: FUND NEW ACTIVITIES: TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICES BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 31.
ENVISIONEERS INC: FUND NEW ACTIVITIES: TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICES BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 22.
REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, THE: TO DO THIS, WE WILL EXPAND SERVICES BY INCREASING THE NUMBER OF SLOTS BY 35.
basic_data.Awarding Agency: Corporation for National and Community Service
basic_data.Awarding Sub Agency: Corporation for National and Community Service
